title: Handle a Qualifying Life Event for Benefits
description: An employee just had a baby and needs to add the newborn to their health insurance.

tasks.description: Identify the employee and explain the process for a qualifying life event (QLE).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent congratulates the employee and explains the 30-day window to make changes.

tasks.description: Provide the employee with a link to the benefits portal and a list of required documents (e.g., birth certificate).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends the necessary resources to the employee.

tasks.description: Once the employee makes the change, review and approve the updated benefits enrollment in the system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent verifies the submitted documents and approves the addition of the dependent.
